library(ape)

aligned_seqs <- read.dna("~/bryo_arthro/lyon_pilot/working/mafft_aligned.fasta", format="fasta")
dim(aligned_seqs)               
image.DNAbin(aligned_seqs)  

d <- dist.dna(aligned_seqs, model="K80", pairwise.deletion=TRUE)

tree_nj <- nj(d)
plot(tree_nj, cex=0.8)

tree_njs <- njs(d)
